name: THE SEVEN LIVING SINS
description:
My Contribution to the #SuNoFes Jam!!

"The Seven Living Sins" is a Short OC Crossover Midquel.
Follow 7 Dumblotraight girls from completely different stories of Dwurm meet for the first time and find out with the help of Satan that they all possess one of the Seven Deadly Sins!
Why? To help her defeat a 200ft tall angelic creature of unknown origin dubbed "The Virtue", who's seemingly only life purpose is to consume sinners.

YOU CAN FOLLOW MY WORK ON THESE LINKS!
